servinfo.title: Fuel Pump Assembly Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Fuel Pump Inspection:For Diesel Engine Model

attention1.ptxt: Before servicing fuel system, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service:For Diesel Engine Model .

s1.ptxt: Remove fuel tank from vehicle. Refer to Fuel Tank Removal and Installation:For Diesel Engine Model .
Disconnect fuel feed pipe (1) and fuel return pipe (3) from fuel pump assembly (2) referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:For Diesel Engine Model .
Remove fuel pump assembly (1) from fuel tank (2) and disconnect suction hose.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Fuel Pump Inspection:For Diesel Engine Model

attention2.ptxt: When connecting joint, clean outside surface of pipe where joint is to be inserted, push joint into pipe till joint lock clicks and check to ensure that pipes are connected securely, or fuel leak may occur.

s1.ptxt: Clean mating surfaces of fuel pump assembly (1) and fuel tank.
Put plate (2) on fuel pump assembly (1) by matching the protrusion of fuel pump assembly (3) to plate hole (4) as shown.
Connect suction hose to fuel pump assembly (1), and install new gasket (2) and fuel pump assembly with plate (3) to fuel tank (4).
Connect fuel feed pipe (1) (pipe joint) and fuel return pipe (3) (pipe joint) to fuel pump assembly (2).
Install fuel tank to vehicle. Refer to Fuel Tank Removal and Installation:For Diesel Engine Model .
